summary: Inspired The Witcher 3 STLM lighting mod.  You are going in vibrant fantasy world. Nights are dark and creepy. Days are bright and clear. Made for the latest enb binary v0.319.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Times New Roman][size=6][b][color=#e06666][center]Required Mods[/center][/color][/b][/size][/font][color=#fff2cc]
[/color][center][b][color=#fff2cc]Natural Lighting and Atmospherics for ENB =>[/color] [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50065/]https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50065/[/url]﻿[/b]
[b][color=#fff2cc]Enhanced Lights and FX (Just install main file dont install optionals like -[elfx enhancer]-) [/color][b][color=#fff2cc]=>[/color] [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27043]https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27043[/url]﻿[/b][/b]
[b][color=#fff2cc]Northern Realistic Clouds Legendary [/color][b][color=#fff2cc]=>[/color] [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/83478]https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/83478[/url]﻿[/b][/b]
[b][color=#fff2cc]Pure Waters or Realistic Water Two [/color][b][color=#fff2cc]=>[/color] [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1111]https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1111[/url]﻿ --- [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41076]https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41076[/url]﻿[/b][/b]
[b][color=#fff2cc]Cinematic Fire Effects 2 HD [/color][b][color=#fff2cc]=>[/color] [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2692/]https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2692/[/url]﻿[/b][/b]
[b][color=#fff2cc]Skyrim ENB Particle Patch [/color][b][color=#fff2cc]=>[/color] [url=http://enbseries.enbdev.com/forum/viewtopic.php?t=1499]http://enbseries.enbdev.com/forum/viewtopic.php?t=1499[/url]﻿[/b][/b]
[b]S[color=#fff2cc]kyrim ENB Subsurface Scattering Patch [/color][b][color=#fff2cc]=>[/color] [url=http://enbseries.enbdev.com/forum/viewtopic.php?t=1499]http://enbseries.enbdev.com/forum/viewtopic.php?t=1499[/url]﻿[/b][/b]
[b][color=#fff2cc]Skyrim ENB Snow FX [/color][b][color=#fff2cc]=>[/color] [url=http://enbseries.enbdev.com/forum/viewtopic.php?t=1908]http://enbseries.enbdev.com/forum/viewtopic.php?t=1908[/url]﻿[/b]
[/b][b][font=Times New Roman][color=#fff2cc]ENB v0.319 => [size=3][url=http://enbdev.com/mod_tesskyrim_v0319.htm]http://enbdev.com/mod_tesskyrim_v0319.htm[/url]﻿[/size][/color][/font]
[/b][font=Times New Roman]
[color=#e06666][size=6][b]Installation[/b][/size][/color]

[size=3][b][color=#fff2cc]-First download required mods
[/color]-[color=#fff2cc]Install NLA v2.0.You need the only esp file.[/color]
[color=#fff2cc]-After you download ENB v0.319.Open the rar file and drop only d3d9 and enbhost.exe to your skyrim directory.[/color]
[color=#fff2cc]-Install other required mods[/color]
[color=#fff2cc]-Download my enb preset and drop the all files to skyrim directory.[/color]
[color=#fff2cc]-Open your skyrim.ini [/color]
[color=#fff2cc]-Press "Ctrl+f" and search this fLightLODMaxStartFade= after set this setting to "[/color][color=#e06666]15500.0[/color][color=#fff2cc]". If you dont have [/color][b][color=#fff2cc]fLightLODMaxStartFade paste[/color] [color=#fff2cc]this setting to under display.[/color]
[/b][color=#fff2cc]-Open your skyrimprefs.ini[/color]
[color=#fff2cc]-Again press "[/color][color=#e06666]Ctrl+f[/color][color=#fff2cc]" and search and set this settings to "fShadowDistance=" set "[/color][color=#e06666]12000[/color][color=#fff2cc]" "fLightLODStartFade" set "[/color][color=#e06666]15500[/color][color=#fff2cc]" "bTreesReceiveShadows=" set "[/color][color=#e06666]1[/color][color=#fff2cc]" "bDrawLandShadows="[/color] [color=#fff2cc]set "[/color][color=#e06666]1[/color][color=#fff2cc]" "bFloatPointRenderTarget=" set "[/color][color=#e06666]1[/color][color=#fff2cc]" "fShadowBiasScale="[/color] [color=#fff2cc]set "[/color][color=#e06666]1.000[/color][color=#fff2cc]"[/color]
[/b][/size][/font][b][color=#fff2cc]"bDeferredShadows=" set "[/color][color=#e06666]1[/color][color=#fff2cc]" "bShadowsOnGrass="[/color] [color=#fff2cc]set[/color][font=Times New Roman][color=#fff2cc] "[/color][color=#e06666]1[/color][color=#fff2cc]"[/color][/font] [color=#fff2cc]"fInteriorShadowDistance="[/color] [color=#fff2cc]set "[/color][color=#e06666]2000[/color]" [color=#fff2cc]"iShadowMapResolution=" set "[/color][color=#e06666]4096[/color]"[color=#fff2cc] for high set "[/color][color=#e06666]8192[/color][color=#fff2cc]"[/color]
[color=#fff2cc]for ultra.[/color][/b][font=Times New Roman][size=3][b]
[color=#fff2cc]-Finished[/color]

[/b][/size][color=#e06666][size=6][b]Some [/b][/size][/color][color=#e06666][size=6][b]Advices[/b][/size][/color]

[b][color=#fff2cc]-If you have fps problems.Try to disable depth of field  and SSAO effect.These effects are eating to much fps.To do this press "Shift+Enter" there is panel on left you can untick these effects.
[/color][/b][color=#fff2cc][b]-And also you can edit my enb. Like: colors, sharpness, brightness.To do this press "Shift+Enter" move your cursor to right upper panel open the effect.txt or enbeffect.fx and now you can edit these settings to your like.
[/b]

[img]https://i.hizliresim.com/JQRmbJ.jpg[/img]﻿﻿

I really like to see your screenshots guys. Thanks For Downloading
[/color][/font][/center]
author: excalibur
